investigatorQuestion.text: We found your fingerprints at the scene. Care to explain?

maskAnswers.playerLine: That's to be expected. I visited there regularly for work purposes.

lowTension.text: Your silence is a choice, but it’s a heavy one to carry.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/StoicLowTension/The Stoic Low Tension 1.mp3

lowTension.text: Every second you spend not talking is a second the world decides your guilt for you.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/StoicLowTension/The Stoic Low Tension 2.mp3

lowTension.text: You think staring makes you look innocent, but it only delays the inevitable.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/StoicLowTension/The Stoic Low Tension 3.mp3

highTension.text: Say something, damn it! You think this quiet act makes you untouchable?
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/StoicHighTension/The Stoic High Tension 1.mp3

highTension.text: You think your mask protects you?
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/StoicHighTension/The Stoic High Tension 2.mp3

highTension.text: I will tear that calm right off your face if I have to!
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/StoicHighTension/The Stoic High Tension 3.mp3

maskAnswers.playerLine: Oh god... I was there. But not when it happened! You have to believe me!

lowTension.text: The tears don't change the facts.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/VictimLowTension/The Victim Low Tension 1.mp3

lowTension.text: No more crying. No more hiding. No more light.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/VictimLowTension/The Victim Low Tension 2.mp3

lowTension.text: Innocence is a fragile thing. Once it’s broken, no amount of weeping can mend it.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/VictimLowTension/The Victim Low Tension 3.mp3

highTension.text: Stop the sniveling! It won't save you now!
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/VictimHighTension/The Victim High Tension 1.mp3

highTension.text: Your tears are useless here. They won’t wash away what’s on your hands.
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/VictimHighTension/The Victim High Tension 1.mp3

highTension.text: I don't care if you're scared. I care about the truth!
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/VictimHighTension/The Victim High Tension 3.mp3

maskAnswers.playerLine: Of course my prints are there! I've been there dozens of times! This is a setup and you know it!

lowTension.text: Yes! Keep that energy, but point it at the facts.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/HotheadLowTension/Hothead Good Low T1.mp3

lowTension.text: That moment of clarity. Hold onto it. That’s exactly what I need.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/HotheadLowTension/Hothead Good Low T2.mp3

lowTension.text: Use that energy! Channel it into the reality!
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/HotheadLowTension/Hothead Good Low T3.mp3

highTension.text: That’s the spirit! Let the truth out.
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/HotheadHighTension/Hothead Good High T1.mp3

highTension.text: Keep shouting if it helps you talk, but keep it on the facts!
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/HotheadHighTension/Hothead Good High T2.mp3
Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/HotheadHighTension/Hothead Good High T3.mp3

maskAnswers.playerLine: Detective, I'm an open book. I've got nothing to hide. Check all the prints you want.

lowTension.text: That’s an intricate story, but even the tightest knots eventually unravel!
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/DeceiverLowTension/The Deceiver Low Tension 1.mp3

lowTension.text: You weave beautiful webs. But even the spider eventually gets tangled.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/DeceiverLowTension/The Deceiver Low Tension 2.mp3

lowTension.text: You weave. You spin. You choke.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/DeceiverLowTension/The Deceiver Low Tension 3.mp3

highTension.text: Stop spinning webs! The truth is staring at you and you’re still trying to paint over it!
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/DeceiverHighTension/The Deceiver High Tension 1.mp3

highTension.text: Every word is rot. Every breath is poison. Every second is a lie.
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/DeceiverHighTension/The Deceiver High Tension 2.mp3

highTension.text: You think you're smart? You're in that chair for a reason, and it’s not because you’re a genius.
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/DeceiverHighTension/The Deceiver High Tension 3.mp3
